meanings.sent1: The twopenny toy was affordable for many children.
meanings.sent2: The twopenny stamp was perfect for mailing a letter.
meanings.sent3: She found a twopenny ring in the bargain bin.
meanings.sent4: His twopenny advice turned out to be quite valuable.
meanings.sent5: The twopenny candy tasted surprisingly delicious.

meanings.sent1: The twopenny trinket was quickly forgotten.
meanings.sent2: His twopenny excuse did not convince anyone.
meanings.sent3: She dismissed his twopenny opinion with a laugh.
meanings.sent4: The twopenny gossip spread like wildfire in the small town.
meanings.sent5: Her twopenny necklace broke after just one wear.
